question_text: What is the role of a prototype program in problem solving

reference_responses.reference_response: To simulate the behaviour of portions of the desired software product

responses_students.answer_question: High risk problems are address in the prototype program to make sure that the program is feasible A prototype may also be used to show a company that the software can be possibly programmed

To address major issues in the creation of the program There is no way to account for all possible bugs in the program but it is possible to prove the program is tangible
